PerturbedHalos package¶

Submodules¶

PerturbedHalos.Cosmology module¶

class PerturbedHalos.Cosmology.Cosmology(redshift, name='', **params)[source]¶

Class to hold the basic cosmology and class attributes.

This can be initialized by a set of cosmological parameters or a pre-defined name.

Loaded cosmological models: - Planck18: Bestfit cosmology from Planck 2018, using the baseline TT,TE,EE+lowE+lensing likelihood. - Quijote: Fiducial cosmology from the Quijote simulations of Francisco Villaescusa-Navarro et al. - Abacus: Fiducial cosmology from the Abacus simulations of Lehman Garrison et al.

__init__()[source]¶

Initialize the class at a given redshift with a specified cosmology.

linear_power()[source]¶

Compute the linear power spectrum for a given k vector.

sigmaM()[source]¶

Compute sigma(M) from CLASS for input mass M.

sigma_logM_int()[source]¶

Return an interpolated value of sigma(M) corresponding to an input log10(M) grid.

dlns_dlogM_int()[source]¶

Return an interpolated value of d(ln(sigma(M)))/d(log10(M)) corresponding to an input log10(M) grid.

dlns_dlogM_int(logM)[source]

Return the value of d(ln sigma(M))/d(log10(M)) using the prebuilt interpolators, which are constructed if not present.

Parameters:logM (float) – log10(M/Msun)
Returns:dln(sigma)/dlog(M)
Return type:float
linear_power(kh_vector, kh_min=0.0)[source]

Compute the linear power spectrum from CLASS for a vector of input k.

If set, we remove any modes below some k_min.

Parameters:
  • kh_vector (float) – Vector of wavenumbers (in h/Mpc units) to compute linear power with.
  • kh_min (float) – Value of k (in h/Mpc units) below which to set P(k) = 0, default: 0.
Returns:

Linear power spectrum in (Mpc/h)^3 units
Return type:

float
sigmaM(M_phys)[source]

Compute sigma(M,z) from CLASS as a vector function.

Parameters:
  • M_phys (float) – Physical mass in M_sun.
  • z (float) – Redshift.
Returns:

sigma(M)
Return type:

float

Return the value of sigma(M) using the prebuilt interpolators, which are constructed if not present.

Parameters:logM (float) – log10(M/Msun)
Returns:sigma(M)
Return type:float
